info.name: n97fit
info.summary: This is a program of data selection and curve fitting by a digital filtering technique including Reinsch-type cubic spline, Fourier harmonics and linear interpolation. It is to derive the fitted curve to the observed data ( CO2, d13C,..), as well as to separate the seasonal, short- and long-term variations from the data.
